socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: percentage of household income allocated to disease-related care
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Social and health care needs in patients with hereditary fructose intolerance in Spain
Quality of life of adult patients with hereditary fructose intolerance

justification: No peer-reviewed cost-of-illness studies specific to hereditary fructose intolerance were identified; available evidence is limited to qualitative and indirect quantitative data from patient surveys and quality-of-life assessments without direct cost figures in euros.
